info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2022
rating_comment:
The stay was exactly as it says. The help from the cleaner and the caretaker was really great.
Mobile network in the area is not great. Better to be prepared to use internet service to communicate. Wifi at the house was good for that purpose.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2021,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Really enjoyed our stay. Robyn and Rahul along with the Manager Khokon really addressed all our needs in timely manner. Only minor suggestion is that some of the furniture should be either reupholstered or replaced, though they are still usable but sort of dampens the look of the apartment as shown in the pictures.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2021,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Great location and their is an assistant at the site who is very helpful in providing any assistance needed.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · March 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It was a pleasant stay in the house with great amenities and communication with the host however one small tiny detail is that before renting this house you need to know that it comes with a caretaker 24/7 staying in the house in a small space within the kitchen. It made some of us feel uncomfortable as we were 11 girls and most of us are girls wearing hijab. It was a little inconvenient. Also, it was stated that there is a washing machine however there wasn’t any to be found. Hope it gets reviewed again other than that its been good the caretaker was very helpful.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Robin has a beautiful, clean and spacious home. The response times for any issues we faced were incredible! Would highly recommend for the great service alone!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: My 2nd stay with Robin. It was good like I expected.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2020,  · Group trip
rating_comment: I feel like I didn’t waste my money on Robin’s house. deserve thank you and 5 ⭐️

info: Rating, 1 star,  · November 2020,  · Group trip
rating_comment: Requires better communication from the host and manager.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2020,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Absolutely amazing place to stay. The manager mr. Sumon is a life saver. I dont think I have ever come accross anybody in hospitality industry like him. He is always making sure if you are happy and you are enjoying your stay! The man is dedicated to make your stay memorable

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2020,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Mr.Robin is a man of word.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2020
rating_comment:
From the day I searched this place and required any additional information, Robin was quick to make us comfortable and guided us.
The place was very neat and clean throughout our stay, all the amenities were present and in working condition.
Robin also helped us figure out about laundry, places to eat and visit in Dhaka. He was very warming throughout our stay.
Shumon, who was handling the daily operations, ensured the food was sent to us on time. Whenever we required anything, he and Robin were a call away.
As we leave for India because of Corona uncertainty, we are extremely happy to have spent last few days here at this place. Would surely recommend you to stay at this place.
Thank you Robin and Shumon for making our stay in Dhaka comfortable and memorable.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2020,  · Group trip
rating_comment:
My family and I enjoyed our stay at the apartment. The apartment was clean and we'll kept during our stay.
Mr. Shumon (manager at the apartment) was very friendly and extremely helpful with everything we needed during our stay. We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to others.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · November 2019
rating_comment: Nice stay at Robins house.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2019,  · Group trip
rating_comment:
This place is great, and a great value.
For an American, Dhaka seems incredibly scary. The lane outside the apartment seemed scary. We arrived in the middle of the night thanks to Bangladesh’s “worst-on-earth” VISA-on-Arrival process which took over 4 hours.
All of that said, the apartment is nice and spacious. The staff is wonderful!
Mainly, Dhaka, more particularly, the people, are warm and wonderful. It seems exotic. There is minimal tourism I’d say, so if you’re inclined to not having all the tourist amenities, I found Dhaka entrancing and this apartment wonderfully located. Everything is chaotic, busy, colorful, frightening and enchanting. If you like that sort of thing. It is not a resort. The sights aren’t great, but the people make it worthwhile. I loved it.

info: Rating, 3 stars,  · September 2019,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Accepted

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · July 2019,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Excellent service and hospitalotu

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2019,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: I was visiting my family in Dhaka, and this place was a perfect location for me to stay. The care taker was very humble and took care of us all the time. It was very hot in summer in Dhaka during June and July, and this apartment is on the 5th, floor and can easily be very hot. However, we had air condition in two rooms except the third room that had no air condition we had the entire apartment for us. Overall, we liked the place and the host was nice and accommodating.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2019,  · Group trip
rating_comment: Excellent sparkling clean location.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2019,  · Group trip
rating_comment:
Spacious and conveniently located. Hosting staffs are eager to provide help when a need arises.
Clean rooms and bed furnishings are well maintained. Both AC’s in the bedrooms performs poorly, I guess because of the constant hot weather it has over ran its capacity to pump cold air continuously. Thank god for those ceiling fans, we had to run at full speed to keep those room cool. Host took care of any issues during our stays. Didn’t had a microwave, but after mentioning it, it was provided immediately. We would rent this place again on our next trip.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2019
rating_comment: For some reason I had to extend my stay at Robin's place. he and his crew did his best to make us all comfortable. outstanding hospitality.
